welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Mendez-Nunez, a charming city known for its rich culture and stunning natural landscapes. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your visit!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, this terminal is exclusively used by Philippine Airlines for its domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, this terminal is used for all domestic flights by various airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free Wi-Fi network for up to 2 hours per device.
